snippet.title: Goodboy Galaxy - October 25th (PC Steam)
snippet.description:
The PC version of Goodboy Galaxy is coming VERY SOON to Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2705890/Goodboy_Galaxy/

🐶🤖 The PC version has new local co-op missions
🖼️🔊 Higher resolution and audio quality than the GBA version
👾👾 The original GBA ROM is included in the files too!

⚠️ Unfortunately the physical release of the GBA version has been stuck with the publisher, First Press Games, who have still not managed to release it despite us paying them well in advance, us supplying all the files, our offers of additional assistance or pressure from our lawyer. 
We have been working with a lawyer to try and either get them to fulfil their obligations or give us our money back so we can publish elsewhere. So far we haven't had any success, but we will do what it takes. 
This has been pretty devastating to us, but it is our intention to do whatever is in the best interest of the players. We will have a full statement regarding the outcome as soon as we are able to. We're both deeply sorry for the delay to those that ordered the GBA physicals or backed them on Kickstarter. 
- Rik + Jeremy
